headline: Here's Why Zimmer Biomet (ZBH) is a Strong Value Stock
summary: Wondering how to pick strong, market-beating stocks for your investment portfolio? Look no further than the Zacks Style Scores.

headline: Zimmer Biomet Announces Webcast and Conference Call of Fourth Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings, Inc. (NYSE and SIX: ZBH), a global medical technology leader, today announced its fourth quarter earnings conference call will be webcast on Tuesday, February 10, 2026, at 8:30 a.m. ET. A news release detailing the quarterly results will be made available that day at 6:30 a.m. ET.

headline: JPM26: Zimmer Biomet doubles down on orthopaedic robotics and specialised sales force in US
summary: According to GlobalData analysis, the surgical robotic market was valued at $10.0bn in 2025 and is projected to reach sales of $17.3bn by 2033.

headline: Is Executive Exit And Cautious Guidance Altering The Investment Case For Zimmer Biomet (ZBH)?
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings, Inc. recently disclosed that former executive officer Mark Bezjak will resign from the company on January 16, 2026, while management has also struck a cautious tone on future performance and guidance at the J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference. These developments come as CEO Ivan Tornos prepares a major direct-to-consumer campaign and emphasizes realistic expectations around the company’s transformation plans through 2026. We’ll now examine how management’s more cautious...
